---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
# load packages
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

# define user interface
ui <- fluidPage(
  # select the independent and dependent variable
  selectInput("x", "Independent variable:", names(mtcars)),
  selectInput("y", "Dependent variable:", names(mtcars)),
  
  # display the scatter plot
  plotOutput("scatterplot")
)

# now define the server function
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  # generate the scatterplot
  output$scatterplot <- renderPlot({
    ggplot(mtcars, aes_string(x = input$x, y = input$y)) +
      geom_point() + 
      geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
      theme_bw()
  })
}

# run shiny app 
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
